DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial design evaluate effect dietary supplementation endometriosis symptom remediation . Adolescent young adult female age 12 25 year surgically-confirmed diagnosis endometriosis eligible study participation . Subjects exclude concurrent chronic illness affect gastrointestinal absorption nutrient ( e.g. , celiac disease , IBD , cystic fibrosis ) , history renal stone , pregnant , non-English speaking . Once consent , subject randomize one 3 treatment assignment : 1 ) vitamin D3 2000 IU daily ( n=30 ) , 2 ) fish oil 1000 mg daily ( n=30 ) , 3 ) placebo ( n=30 ) take daily 6 month . Baseline nutrient intake food supplement assess use Food Frequency Questionnaire ( FFQ ) . The 142 item survey assess usual dietary intake past year . Validated rating scale include visual analog scale ( VAS ) , SF-36 , World Endometriosis EPHect questionnaires use measure pain overall quality life . The SF-36 measure 8 health concept relevant across disease group , include limitation physical social activity health problem , vitality , general health perception . Patients complete full review medication usage , past medical history , family history , lifestyle factor . Anthropometrics measure , vital sign obtain . Measures repeat 3-month interval total 6 month . Blood drawn baseline , 6 month measure level fatty acid , vitamin D , parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) , calcium .
